welcome_message_body: Welcome to Walthamstow, a charming and vibrant neighborhood known for its bustling markets, rich history, and artistic community. We invite you to explore our streets, soak up the local culture, and enjoy everything our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Petit Cafe
restaurants.description: Petit Cafe is a lebanese restaurant located in London.
restaurants.address: 4 Minnie Baldock St, Canning Town North, Greater London, E16 1YE

restaurants.name: Gaucho

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at London City Airport provides exclusive services for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free for the first 60 minutes.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving a variety of international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly European and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A major terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving a mix of international and long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A small terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly long-haul and Middle Eastern flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with a premium option for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Luton Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport handles most international and long-haul flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport handles most domestic and European flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport with a 90 minute time limit per session.
